summary: Build an in-app reminder/notification feature that plays a generic iPhone-style ringtone and displays a permanent 3D armored-hero (Ironman-inspired) character in the UI with idle animations, switching to a dance animation when reminders trigger, plus different animations per tab.
architectural_notes: Use legally safe assets: generic iPhone-style ringtone (not Apple’s official tone) and a generic Ironman-inspired armored character (not copyrighted IP).
Reminder notifications are in-app only (no real push notifications).

existing_features.title: Ensure the app provides in-app reminder notifications that trigger while the app is open, displaying a toast notification with reminder title and scheduled time, and allowing the user to dismiss it.
Play a legally-safe, generic iPhone-style ringtone when an in-app reminder notification triggers, and stop/reset the audio when the notification is dismissed.
Add a permanent, non-copyright-infringing 3D armored-hero/robot character inside the main app interface that is visible during normal app usage (not only inside the reminder toast).
Implement character animation states: an idle/normal mode by default, switch to a clear dancing animation automatically when a reminder triggers, and return to idle after the reminder is dismissed.

Change the character’s animation based on the currently selected app tab: when the user switches tabs, the character switches to a tab-specific animation (e.g., drink water, jump, doing call, funny movement) while still overriding to 'dance' during active reminder notifications.
Wire the reminder-notification trigger to the character animation system so that the reminder toast and the main-interface character respond to the same reminder event.

Apply a cohesive, creative visual theme for the new character area and reminder notification UI (colors, typography, spacing, and motion), consistent with the existing Tailwind design system, avoiding a blue/purple-dominant palette.

new_feature_requests.summary: In-app reminders with ringtone + 3D armored character animations (idle, dance on reminder, different per tab)

projectName: Add in-app reminders with ringtone + animated 3D armored character with per-tab animations
